title: Triggers & Cravings
description: Identify and understand your triggers to develop better coping strategies

fields.label: Describe the triggering situation
fields.help: What happened? Where were you? Who was there?

fields.label: What emotions did you feel?
fields.help: Anger, sadness, anxiety, excitement, loneliness, etc.

fields.label: What physical sensations did you notice?
fields.help: Racing heart, sweating, tension, restlessness, etc.

fields.label: What coping strategies did you use?
fields.help: Called sponsor, attended meeting, exercised, journaled, etc.

fields.label: What did you learn from this experience?
What will you do differently next time?
What support do you need?
fields.help: What resources or people could help you manage this trigger?
